text: One called La Patriote is Communist, and at the time of our arrival it was throwing huge over-ripe verbal tomatoes at General de Gaulle. One side of this square is a smart but modest bar called Pierre's Bar. For one with the help of the Syndicat dInitiative, we had been hunting for furnished rooms, and had given ups when an elderly lady, the owner of a residence called the Poet's Nest, had frmly closed the door in our noses.
